actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide Federal grants to assist elementary and secondary schools to carry on programs to teach the principles of ethics and citizenship.

summary.text: Directs the Commissioner of Education to make grants to assist elementary and secondary schools in establishing programs that teach the principles of ethics and citizenship. Authorizes to be appropriated $5,000,000 for each fiscal year 1975 through 1977 to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide Federal grants to assist elementary and secondary schools to carry on programs to teach the principles of ethics and citizenship.
